title: Sri Lankan rupee continues to depreciate against USD
body_lines: The Central Bank of Sri Lanka (CBSL) announced the official exchange rates for today (April 06) with Sri Lankan Rupee hitting a record low, as it fell further against the US Dollar.
According to the Central Bank, the selling rate of a US Dollar now stands at Rs. 308.49.
On Tuesday (April 05), the official selling rate of US Dollar exceeded Rs. 300 mark for the first time in Sri Lankan history.
